[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=75878 On the DD-WRT forums] (high res board images)
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wrt54gx On the OpenWrt wiki] [http://bb.watch.impress.co.jp/cda/review/12219.html Review w/ internal shots (JP)] The power adapter included with the device appears to be an AD-121ANDT. ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. The default SSID is '''Linksys''' (capital L). ==Images== File:Linksys WRT54GX board top bq.jpg|bad quality shot of the top of the board File:Linksys WRT54GX component closeup.jpg|closeup of the RAM, Flash (minus sticker), and CPU File:Linksys WRT54GX airgo unshielded.jpg|the MAC/BB of the Airgo card [[Has images::internal| ]]
